title: Nikita Iosifov
text:
Nikita Igorevich Iosifov (; born 11 April 2001) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a>er who plays as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> for Spanish club <a href="Villarreal%20CF%20B">Villarreal B</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Lokomotiv%20Moscow">FC Lokomotiv Moscow</a> on 11 August 2020 in a game against <a href="FC%20Rubin%20Kazan">FC Rubin Kazan</a>, he substituted <a href="Dmitri%20Barinov">Dmitri Barinov</a> in added time.
On 12 July 2021, he joined <a href="Villarreal%20CF%20B">Villarreal B</a> in Spain on a five-year contract. He was occasionally included in the matchday squads of the senior <a href="Villarreal%20CF">Villareal</a> team for <a href="La%20Liga">La Liga</a> and <a href="UEFA%20Champions%20League">UEFA Champions League</a> games early in the <a href="2021%E2%80%9322%20Villarreal%20CF%20season">2021–22 season</a>, but remained on the bench. He made his debut for the senior team on 30 November 2021 in a <a href="2021%E2%80%9322%20Copa%20del%20Rey">Copa del Rey</a> game against the sixth-tier club Victoria CF and scored Villareal's last goal in a 8–0 victory.
